meta.title: Naverix - Ship inspections. Reinvisioned.
meta.description: A complete solution for performing any type of ship inspection. Inspection templates fully customisable to your needs with advanced logic built in.

landing.title: Ship inspections. Reinvisioned.
landing.subtitle: A complete solution for performing any type of ship inspection. Inspection templates fully customisable to your needs with advanced logic built in. Built with the needs of crew as well as ship management in mind.

items.title: Built from experience
items.content: Our founders have 40+ years of experience in all roles from Chief engineer to Sptd level to MD and our goal was to build a tool that aims to support both the Superintendent and Senior officers aboard vessels in performing inspections in a fast, reliable, ergonomic and integrative way.

items.title: Built for excellence
items.content: Our IT team consists of scientists and highly experienced software developers with 30+ years of experience. Our goal is to deliver the best experience and technological solutions to support the vision of our founders.

items.title: Custom inspections. Built for you.
items.content: You need an inspection template? We will design one for your and let your people perform inspections using it. You need a docking document? Balast tank inspection document? Cargo tank? VIQ? QCR? We can build it. Fast.

items.title: Focused on doing the right job and the job right.
items.content: We are focused on not disrupting your crews normal workflow but instead enable them to perform inspections from anywhere they are while ensuring consistency and quality of findings.

items.title: Built with integrations in mind
items.content: Connect to API of your PMS to create work orders from NAVERIX. Stay notified of their status.

features.title: Key features of the NAVERIX system

items.title: Use ours or let us develop inspections tailored to your needs
items.content: Our smart template's editor  allow us to develop inspections templates specific to your company and deliver them fast.Templates can include various attributes, conditions, references, instructions. Or you just use our templates, ready from the shelves.

items.title: Fill out inspections in your cabin or on the move using our mobile app
items.content: Whether in the ballast tanks or in the cabin, our mobile platform allows you to complete inspections in an ergonomic manner, filling out sections as you go, and uploading it directly to the cloud as soon as you are connected to the internet.
listItems: Real-time updates between the mobile and desktop with internet
Eliminate overlaps with role-specific delegations of sections

items.title: Superintendent and his team can collaborate with senior officers on board to resolve defficiencies
items.content: Senior officers and superintendents are notified of any reported defficiencies and can collaborate on their resolution, enhancing the current process by having everyone in the loop.
listItems: Collaborate with the whole team on a single platform
Immediately resolve defficiencies on board or plan for them when ashore

roadmapItems.title: Platform idea
roadmapItems.description: We can create a better system for doing inspections!

roadmapItems.title: Presentation to CEOs

questions.question: Who is Naverix for?
questions.answer:
Ship management companies of any size can benefit from Naverix. It is a great tool for performing inspections of any type or just gathering data using custom forms. It’s easy to configure and deploy to your ships. What you get is an ultra-focused tool for performing inspections using our smart templates, improving the speed and quality of findings, enabling shore-ship collaboration, generating and sharing reports, and access to advanced data analytics that transform the inspection process entirely.

Freelance inspectors will also be able to use NAVERIX soon. They will be able to receive requests for their services through our mobile application and perform inspections using our smart templates. The report will be automatically available to the company that requested the service/inspection, simplifying the process.

Ship owners will also be able to use NAVERIX soon. They will be able to access finalized reports and/or receive monthly or annual deep data analytics of their ships or fleets (depending on service levels purchased).

questions.question: How can I learn more about Naverix?
questions.answer: You can send us a message using the contact form below or call us using the number displayed beside the contact form. Once we get in touch, we will try to learn more about your needs and provide you with the best options. We can also schedule a demo of NAVERIX and answer all of your questions.

questions.question: What are the key benefits of using Naverix?
questions.answer:
First of all, you make the inspection process continuous, meaning inspections are still specific snapshots of the state of the vessel at a certain point in time, but Naverix enables you to store all of the data and the findings, and can keep you updated on all the issues found in previous inspections on specific items (e.g., lifeboat issues), preventing detention issues from arising.

All the benefits of digitally transformed processes: data is stored in the cloud and available at all times, no paper is involved, shore-ship collaboration is enabled, reports are practically completed as soon as data collection is completed, speed is increased while quality of findings is improved using our built-in help features.

Smart templates reduce the load on the crew by displaying only items relevant to the ship on which the inspection is being performed....

Our mobile and web application enables senior officers to start filling out the inspection document in their offices, while other crew members can fill out the form on-the-go using our mobile application (which works fine anywhere on the ship on an intrinsically safe smartphone).

questions.question: How are you different from other inspection form solutions?
questions.answer:
Flexibility - We are a startup that can easily adapt to the changing needs of our clients.

Template editor - Our forms are not static - through our powerful template editor, we can customize standard templates and build new ones tailored to your exact needs very quickly.

Smart templates - Our templates adapt to the ship on which the inspection is being performed, reducing the load on the crew and making the process faster.

Smart dashboards - for the superintendents and their teams ashore, and the senior officers on ships.

Web and mobile application - offering multiple options for answering inspection questions and gathering data (photos, videos) from anywhere on the ship, synchronizing in the cloud.

Report generator - receive reports formatted to the exact structure as defined in your SAS documents. Reports are completed much faster than before, and sharing the report with any stakeholders is super easy.

Advanced data analysis for management for improved decision making.

So much more is coming soon

meta.title: Naverix - Ship inspections. Reinvisioned.
meta.description: A complete solution for performing any type of ship inspection. Inspection templates fully customisable to your needs with advanced logic built in.

about.title: What is NAVERIX?
about.comment: A completely new digital platform, created jointly by maritime and IT experts, enabling complete digital transformation of performing all kinds of inspections aboard commercial vessels.

items.title: Mission
items.content: To combine maritime and IT expertise and ideas to make the vision a reality

items.title: Goal
items.content: Our goal is to remove the unnecessary and create an environment where the knowledge worker can make the most of his skills and time for professional fulfilment and the company’s well-being.

items.title: Values
items.content: Teamwork. Digital inspection forms on mobile devices and computers enable cooperation regardless of the location of the participants. Quick adaptation of forms to the user’s way of working. Company references and instructions with questions. An intuitive graphic approach to the inspections of ballast tanks. Centralized management of findings and deficiencies ready for a two-way connection with the PMS (planned maintenance system). Dashboards are adapted to every management level, providing key data at a glance at the screen.

items.title: OFFICE <-> FLEET INTEGRATION
items.description: Cloud based architecture enables the ship management office to remain in sync with all of the ships under it’s management.

items.title: Configurable and customisable
items.description: Our inspection editor can create standardised or fully customised inspection forms based on client requirements.

items.title: WORK ABOVE AND BELOW DECK
items.description: Fill out inspections in your cabin/office on your laptop/PC, and continue using our mobile app even when offline. The app will sync the data you input when it gets back online.

items.title: Data analysis
items.description: See trends and issues across your fleets, ship types, and sections. Analyses optimised for each management level of technical and marine departments.

items.title: PMS integration ready
items.description: Deficiencies found during inspections become tasks in PMS, and once resolved, the status on the deficiencies list is automatically updated. Note: two-way integration requires PMS maker consent.

items.title: KNOWLEDGE BASED SUPPORT
items.description: Use integrated standard references, company instructions or knowledge based support features to increase the quality of inspection findings.

items.title: SENIOR OFFICERS COLLABORATION
items.description: After everything is inspected, senior officers can discuss the findings and correct what is possible with the ship’s resources. The remaining issues became part of the inspection report.

items.title: work on reports
items.description: Vessel managers can access reports online and discuss trends, indicators, and corrective actions without leaving the app. Access to external entities, like owners, is possible as well.

processExplained.title: A sample process, explained.
processExplained.description: Please note that the process varies depending on type of inspection - the process shown above is most suitable for preparatory VIQ/RISQ inspections. When a superintendent performs a quarterly inspection himself there are no collaborating parties.

meta.title: Naverix - Ship inspections. Reinvisioned.
meta.description: A complete solution for performing any type of ship inspection. Inspection templates fully customisable to your needs with advanced logic built in.

team.title: Meet our team
team.comment: We are an IT company built on know how from the maritime industry focused on providing new solutions that help digitaly transform  ship management.

teamMembers.name: Ivan Blažina, mech. ing.
teamMembers.title: Board member
teamMembers.description: After years at sea as a Chief Engineer, Ivan continued his maritime career on land. He worked as a Superintendent and Purchasing Manager for Thome Ship Management. He spent the last nine years as a Group Purchasing Director and Managing Director in the Anglo-Eastern group, working from Singapore and Hong Kong. In addition to other achievements, Ivan introduced SPC (a single point of contact), globally consolidated the group's procurement and reduced the number of suppliers by six times.

teamMembers.name: Raul Matović. mech. ing.
teamMembers.title: Board member
teamMembers.description: Raul spent 16 years at sea, during which time he served in all ranks up to Chief Engineer. During this time he served on various ship types including oil and chemical tankers, general cargo vessels, container vessels, ro-ro vessels, bulk-carriers and passenger ships. Since moving ashore in 1991 Raul has gained experience in many aspects of vessel management, ship and machinery repairs, conversion and new buildings and has held positions ranging from Superintendent engineer to Managing Director with Thome Group in Singapore.  In year 2018 Raul start own consulting company in Singapore.

teamMembers.name: Mile Pavlić, PhD IT
teamMembers.title: Board member
teamMembers.description: Mile is a entrepreneur and a full time professor, achieving success in both business and academical fields. His company “RIS” which he co-founded in 1993 has been developing complex business information systems for clients like the Croatian National Television and Croatia Osiguranje (the largest insurance agency in Croatia) for decades, recently moving towards web based solutions. While leading his company from humble beginnings to over 50 employees he also climbed the academic ladder to the title of full professor at University of Rijeka, Faculty of Informatics and Digital technologies.

teamMembers.name: Igor Jugo PhD IT
teamMembers.title: Software lead
teamMembers.description: After working at the University of Rijeka, Faculty of Informatics and Digital Technologies for 14 years, where he obtained MSc in optimizing performance of web applications and PhD in educational data mining while also developing complex web solutions for clients of his previous company he took on a management role as CIO of Clinical Hospital Center in Rijeka after which he moved full time to his new company Intellego, which is an IT consultancy specialised in web solutions and IT service management.

meta.title: Naverix - Ship inspections. Reinvisioned.
meta.description: A complete solution for performing any type of ship inspection. Inspection templates fully customisable to your needs with advanced logic built in.

roadmap.title: The Naverix Roadmap
roadmap.comment: As we aim for digital transformation of many aspects of ship management we set our goals beyond the horizon with a map to follow to accomplish our goals.

timelineItems.title: Platform idea
timelineItems.description: We can create a better system for doing inspections!

timelineItems.title: Initial specification
timelineItems.description: Let’s write it down to make sure we cover all phases and aspects of this complex process

timelineItems.title: Initial pitch
timelineItems.description: We presented the initial idea at our startup hub

timelineItems.title: Presentation for maritime professionals and academics
timelineItems.description: We presented an initial graphic prototype to captains, superintendents and academics to gather valuable feedback

timelineItems.title: Presentation to fleet managers
timelineItems.description: We presented our solution to a number of fleet managers from Rotterdam to Singapore to get more valuable feedback from their perspective

timelineItems.title: Presentation to CEOs
timelineItems.description: We presented our solution to highly experienced CEOs of ship management companies to get more valuable feedback from their perspective

timelineItems.title: Presentation to first potential client - a large ship management company
timelineItems.description: We presented our solution to the members of  HSEQ and QA management team

timelineItems.title: Deploy to a real world company test
timelineItems.description: We deployed the first version of our systems web application interface to our first potential client

timelineItems.title: Make improvements and deploy the new web version
timelineItems.description: Many useful comments from experienced professionals lead to a highly improved product

timelineItems.title: Deploy mobile application
timelineItems.description: With the addition of our mobile solution the users can experience the full potential of our system

timelineItems.title: Development of Balast Tank inspections module
timelineItems.description: Our Balast Tanks inspection module brings even more power to the users and makes reporting on balast tanks much more precise while keeping it safe and fast.

timelineItems.title: Development of Main deck inspections module
timelineItems.description: Our Main Deck inspections module makes another one of our highly specialised modules that combine our know how, the advanced features of NAVERIX and the needs of our clients closer together to achieve the next steps towards full digital transformation of the inspection process.

timelineItems.title: Upgrade our advanced inspection template editor to create any form you need
timelineItems.description: Our template editor already enables us to create complex, configurable and adaptable inspection templates but it can do much more - create any form you could need to be filled aboard the ship and receive this data instantly

timelineItems.title: Enable freelance inspectors to use Naverix
timelineItems.description: With the ever growing number of inspection templates we will be happy to welcome freelance inspectors performing inspections using the NAVERIX system per request from various stakeholders

timelineItems.title: Data analytics module
timelineItems.description: With dozens of inspections performed on ships per year, each inspection containing from 100 to 400 questions the amount of data gathered by the NAVERIX system will rise quickly. To give you relevant information and knowledge to help your decisions making processes we will offer data analytics services
